QuickTextUsage.name: QuickTextUsage
QuickTextUsage.description: Represents the usage of quick text on a record, including which quick text was used, who used it, and how they used it.

AppContext.description: Context in which the quick text was used. Possible values are: Aloha—Salesforce Classic Lightning—Lightning Experience Unknown

Channel.description: The channel in which the quick text was used. Possible values are: Email Event Generic Internal Knowledge Live Agent Messaging Phone Portal Social Task

FolderId.description: ID of the folder containing the quick text at the time it was used.

LaunchSource.description: How the user started the quick text. Possible values are: Floater Keyboard shortcut Macro Toolbar

LoggedTime.description: The time when the quick text was used.

OwnerId.description: ID of the group or user that owns the quick text.

UserId.description: ID of the user that used the quick text.
